commit message:
Change icon helper improvements.

Now warns user if their icon pack can't individually select icons.
Uses dialog instead of raw intent
Updated ActionBar.  Added spinner, removed widget config from menu
Workaround for SharedPrefs being wiped by pinned apps.
We don't need to translate this
Pinned fix, smaller image size for faster loading
Update icon pack icon on selection
Database lock checks, cleanup, fixed blank second page issue
Fix new installs hiding entire rows and icons
